content.question: Which of the following is true of production in the long run?

choices.label: At least one factor of production is fixed.
Only one factor of production is fixed.
Some factors of production are fixed while others are variable.
All factors of production are variable.
All factors of production, except technology, are fixed.

content.answer: All factors of production are variable.

unit.text: 3: Production, Cost, and the Perfect Competition Model

skill.text: Skill 1.A: Describe economic concepts, principles, or models.
